title: FREE ALISTAR SKIN?!?!??!?!
body: Hey guys! So I read that apparently you could get the unchained alistar skin for free by going to this link and subscribing https://youtube.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/youtube ... however that no longer works. Am I still able to get it for free some other way? <3      (here is a board that talked a bunch about it     https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/F6nPNQcj-how-to-unlock-your-free-unchained-alistar-skin )     Thanks in advance!!!!

replies.body: Enter a support ticket and put that you subscribed and want the skin, the bot should give it to you.

> the bot should give it to you.

Support is not bots -_-
Those requests are automatically forwarded to the Blitzcrank Bot, who indeed is a bot. As the name implies. And a support. It's all quite meta actually.
lol ikr I did ask tho we'll see what happens :)

lol ikr I did ask tho we'll see what happens :)

and we will play with it main please
